name: Polar
description:
Polar

"Polar" is part of The Fauna Notebook, a collection of 2D digital paintings that portray the unique gorgeousness found in Earth's fauna. All the elements in the background relate to the painting's theme. In "Polar", the background depicts the habitat map of polar bear populations; polar bear genetics variance; graph of glaciers mass loss over the decades; the molecular structure of ice; and other related details.

11220 x 6270
